formName: Application for Authorised Economic Operator (Section 4 C118-questionnaire)

fields.infoText: Your trader identification number is the same as your Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number

fields.label: Why am I being asked for this?
fields.infoText: We use your EORI number to link together all 7 forms for your application.

fields.label: EORI Number
Member states country codes
fields.infoText:
Find the required [member state country codes](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes#a "Member state country codes") here 

 You will need to press back in your browser to get back to this form

fields.helpText: Enter your country code, for example GB, followed by your 12 numerical digit EORI number
fields.errorMessage: Input your country code and EORI number

sections.title: Financial solvency
sections.description: Guidance for this section can be found at (Article 39 (c) UCC, Article 26 UCC IA, AEO Guidelines Part 2 Section III)

fields.label: Have any bankruptcy or insolvency proceedings been initiated in respect of your company's assets in the last 3 years?
fields.shortName: Bankruptcy or insolvency proceedings initiated in the last 3 years (4.1)

sections.title: Financial solvency - Bankruptcy or insolvency proceedings initiated in the last 3 years
sections.shortName: Financial solvency -Bankruptcy or insolvency proceedings initiated

fields.label: Provide details of the bankruptcy or insolvancy proceedings that have been initiated in the last 3 years
Has your company had a consistently good financial standing within the meaning of Article 26 of the UCC IA, sufficient to meet its financial commitments, over the last 3 years?

sections.title: Financial solvency -  not consistently good financial standing

fields.label: Provide full details of your financial standing and why it does not meet the consisitently good financial standing within the meaning of Article 26 of the UCC IA, sufficient to meet its financial commitments, over the last 3 years
fields.shortName: Full details of your financial standing

fields.label: Has the company been established for less than 3 years due to an internal reorganisation of a previously existing company (eg incorporation or sale of a business unit)?

fields.infoText:
If you are a newly established business, provide all records and information in relation to your financial status. For example, latest cash flow, balance sheet and profit and loss forecasts approved by the directors/partners/sole proprietor.

 We accept documents in formats like pdf and jpeg (5mb maximum).

fields.label: Upload your latest cash flow
Upload your latest balance sheet
Upload your latest profit and loss forecasts

sections.title: Financial solvency in the foreseeable future
sections.shortName: Financial solvency in the foreseeable future

fields.label: Is there anything you are aware of that could impact on your financial solvency in the foreseeable future?
fields.shortName: Aware of anything that could impact future financial solvency (4.4)

fields.label: Give details of anything that you are aware of that may impact future financial solvency
fields.shortName: Details of your things that may impact future financial solvency

fields.label: Do you have a Duty Deferment Account?
Enter your deferment approval number (DAN)

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
First name
fields.errorMessage: First name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Last name
fields.errorMessage: Last name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Status
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary
fields.errorMessage: Position in the company can only include letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: To receive confirmation that your return has been submitted, enter an email address below
Email address
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com

fields.infoText: This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.

fields.label: Payment
